heading: Platform Contributions
content: Platform Contributions are ecosystem-led contributions to be built into and enhance Spryker’s core product. These include bug fixes, core improvements, and documentation updates across Spryker’s product portfolio.

heading: Innovation Lab
content: Innovation Lab contributions are ecosystem-led submissions demonstrating innovative but often experimental use cases built for use with Spryker. E.g. hackathon projects, tools, and customer & partner innovation ideas. They may be utilized in any part of the Spryker platform, including the products listed above.

heading: Commercial Contribution
content: To be announced later this year

heading: Submission Review
content: Spryker endeavors to have all submissions acknowledged within two weeks. Submissions will be accepted or returned with feedback.
